Articles.Content:
Is the hotfix standalone, or do I have to merge it with the .21 download somehow?

Even better, it is outdated now!

So I've just updated to 0.23 and fixed an issues that was left open with the hotfix.

Tags are now filtered based on whether they contain researched parts, if they don't (and no of their child tags do) they won't be displayed in your menu.

Part categories are now filtered based on researched parts aswell so they no longer leave you with empty tabs.
You sir are a legend.
You, you are amazing.
It seems to be working fine in career mode, but in sandbox, there is no part catalog.

It seems to be working fine in career mode, but in sandbox, there is no part catalog.

This. Is something wrong?

It seems to be working fine in career mode, but in sandbox, there is no part catalog.

I have the same exact bug.
Same here. It won't show up in sandbox.
Is the config window supposed to open every time I visit the VAB? That's slightly obnoxious.

Same here. It won't show up in sandbox.

Looks like it's only working in career mode now - maybe something to do with the update to check if parts were researched?
Getting the same bug as everybody else with the catalog not showing up in Sandbox.

I know people are after .23 compatability more than features, but is it possible to have the auto categorization work based on mod pack? I noticed you had something like that in a image on your leading post. Is it also possible to allow mods to have data in their part cfg files that your mod can pick up on? This would allow for something like the Kethan pack to mark all his parts as 'Kethane', maybe mark the scanners as 'Scanners' too.

I know people are after .23 compatability more than features, but is it possible to have the auto categorization work based on mod pack? I noticed you had something like that in a image on your leading post. Is it also possible to allow mods to have data in their part cfg files that your mod can pick up on? This would allow for something like the Kethan pack to mark all his parts as 'Kethane', maybe mark the scanners as 'Scanners' too.

That is how it already works dude. Click on the icon assigned to kethane and it will only show the kethane parts. Same for all other mods. All the others parts vanish until you re-enable them.

Have you even installed and tried this mod?

Edited December 20, 2013 by Kass
I hope when missing sandbox mode will be repaired, author will get rid of another bugs we had in previous versions, like missing ertain parts from various mod packs.

Sandbox mode is being repaired right now, was a last minute change I didn't double check against sandbox mode.

Just wrapping everything up so expect a patched release on the front page in a few minutes

I'm still trying to replicate the missing part bug, as even back then I haven't found a single occasion of that happening.

Just tried it with AIES and the American Pack and found no missing parts.

You do hit the auto tag button after installing new stuff don't you?

That is how it already works dude. Click on the icon assigned to kethane and it will only show the kethane parts. Same for all other mods. All the others parts vanish until you re-enable them.

Have you even installed and tried this mod?

lol, nope

I didn't want to install it if it didn't have support for this. Will give it a go then.

Thanks.

lol, nope

I didn't want to install it if it didn't have support for this. Will give it a go then.

Thanks.

You genuinely made me crack-up when I read this

Yeah, it's a great mod and tbh, pretty much essential. I have basically every mod under the sun installed and this is the only way I can make any sense of my parts list in the VAB SPH.

Hmm... this seems to be giving me chronically low FPS when in the VAB...

I don't get any of the mod icons showing up either, and it asks me where to place the bar each time I enter VAB.
Maybe you have installed it incorrectly? It works perfectly here with more than 20 mods installed.

BlackNecro when you create windows you should use id more "random" than 100+i. Choose a large number and start from this.

I had 2 others mods colliding with those windows id. And while it does funny drawing I am sure most users won't understand what happened

Having a problem with my layout settings not saving. Every time I enter the VAB, it automatically defaults to the settings button being at the top and unchecks the autohide box. Minor inconvenience, but still annoying when I don't want to have the catalog always visible. When I don't need it.

BlackNecro when you create windows you should use id more "random" than 100+i. Choose a large number and start from this.

I had 2 others mods colliding with those windows id. And while it does funny drawing I am sure most users won't understand what happened

Interesting, thought the ids were just for the callback functions, not global ones, but didn't spent much thought on it either, will move it to some other number range then.

Having a problem with my layout settings not saving. Every time I enter the VAB, it automatically defaults to the settings button being at the top and unchecks the autohide box. Minor inconvenience, but still annoying when I don't want to have the catalog always visible. When I don't need it.

Will have a look into that.
I'm having same problem with auto hide layout not saving.
I noticed it only saves the first settings you made
How can i stop options menu asking me when place toolbar rom appearing every single time i open VAB?

How can i stop options menu asking me when place toolbar rom appearing every single time i open VAB?

Aha! thought that was just me.
